body.name: [Eyesafe Display] 4K Support Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth, ADEPTICO 450 ANSI 5G WiFi Native 1080P Portable Projector w/ Bag, Zoom, Outdoor Movie Mini Projector for iOS/Android/TV Stick/HDMI/USB
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 16 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 18 hrs 16 mins
features: ➤【NATIVE 1080P & Eyesafe Display-TÜV CERTIFIED】 This outdoor projector has real native 1920*1080 resolution (Support 4K), 450 ANSI, 15000:1 high contrast ratio, and the latest color reproduction technology, which ensures bring clear, bright, and fantastic images for the home theater pleasure. The home theater projector also adopts a high-refraction 7 layers glassed lens and diffuse reflection eye-caring light source, ensuring protect the eyes while providing vivid images.

➤【FASTER & STABLE 5G/2.4G DUAL-BAND WIFI & BLUETOOTH 5.2 CONNECTION】 Enjoy fast and stable connections with the dual-band 5G/2.4G WiFi and Bluetooth capabilities of our projector. Whether you're streaming content, playing games, or connecting external devices, you can count on seamless performance without any buffering or lagging issues.

➤【MASSIVE 200" DISPLAY & 75% ZOOM】Transform any wall or screen into a massive 200" display with our projector. Whether you're hosting a movie night or giving a presentation, the large screen size ensures everyone can enjoy a clear view. Additionally, the zoom feature (75%-100%) allows you to adjust the projection size to suit your specific needs and space limitations.

➤【WIDE COMPATIBILITY & SEALED ENGINE DESIGN】 Equipped with HDMIx2 / USB / AV / 3.5mm headphone jack, compatible with Fire TV Stick, Roku, DVD, Laptop, USB, Computer, Headphone, External Speaker, iPhone Android, iPad, PS5, etc. You can use it for garden parties, home theater, outdoor camping, and more. Sealed engine design, which is not easy to enter dust, can effectively reduces screen black spots and image quality loss.

➤【RELIABLE CUSTOMER SERVICE SUPPORT】 ADEPTICO provides 30 days guarantee for return (warranty for replacement or refund) and 3-year tech support, If you have any problems, please contact us immediately and get a 24H Service Reply by ""Order-Get Help" from the Amazon Station Message. (PS: If you have missed any parts or received the broken item in the package, we will send a new one to you)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: *WARM NOTE*: Due to the HDCP (High-bandwidth Digital Content Protection) agreement, screen mirroring doesn't work (no image or sound) when you try to mirror the content from some streaming services (Netflix, Hulu, etc.). Please understand that we must comply with the laws.

Protecting Children's Eyes The projector adopts anti-blue light technology, effectively filtering the blue light of 415-455nm wavelength, reducing the stimulation of blue light to the eyes and effectively protecting children's eyes Zoom Function When you want to reduce the display size of the screen at a fixed distance, press function button on native 1080P projector or remote control then choose "Reduce Display size 75%" source to adjust any size between 75% to 100%.

Previous page Not Only For Movies, But For Anything Freely Customize the placement according to your preference. 200'' Huge Projection Size Get 35 inches to 200 inches projection size at will with 3.6ft to 18.5ft projection distance. 450ANSI，4k Supported More Ture Color，Native Resolution 1920*1080，Brighter Picture Next page 1 Multiple Installation 2 200" Big Projection Size 3 1080P + Support 4K

Previous page Supports Stable Connection For better quality sound you can connect to Bluetooth audio via Bluetooth 5G/2.4G DUAL-BAND WIFI Seamless performance without any buffering or lagging issues Cast Your Favorite Video Due to copyright of Apps, Netflix, Prime Video, Hulu, etc. can only play via TV Stick, Roku, etc. Next page 1 5.2 Bluetooth 2 WiFi Screen Mirroring 3 Works with TV Stick

Previous page Entertainment for Yoga Enthusiasts Yoga in Focus, Wellness in Motion Bring You Happy Time Enjoy fast and low-latency gameplay. Input latency of 50 ms and refresh rate of 60 HZ Make It a Family Day Easily turn on the projector and watch any video you want Illuminate Your Imagination Projector Art, Where Vision Comes to Life Enjoy the Moment, Together Projector Pleasure, Amplifying Outdoor Entertainment Next page 1 Exercise Time 2 Smooth Game Graphics 3 Private Cinema 4 Art Making 5 Outdoor Entertainment

Why can't I mirror/cast Netflix, Hulu, or Amazon Prime videos? Due to the HDCP protocol, our projectors do not support streaming videos from Netflix, Hulu, or Amazon Prime, over the phone. Instead, you can connect Amazon Fire TV Stick or a Google Chromecast to the projector to stream videos. Why is there no sound when I play videos via Chromecast, Roku, or Fire TV stick on my projector? Please go to the Sound Settings of your TV stick and select Auto Detect or PCM. After setting, the projector will be able to decode the audio from the stick. How to avoid audio lag when using Bluetooth? In order to get rid of the lag, we suggest you mirror your device to the projector via a wired connection. Additionally, please move your Bluetooth device closer to the projector in order to minimize interference in the environment. Why is my projector out of focus and blurry? Please adjust the focus ring and keystone ring to try to optimize image quality. Try to adjust the projection size from 60" to 120" based on the distance between the projector and the screen. Why is there no response when I use the remote control? The remote control does not come with batteries, so please prepare two AAA batteries on your own and install them into the remote. Point the remote at the IR receiver on the back of the projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ADEPTICO Projector: The Ultimate Blend of Quality and Convenience
reviews.reviewText: After long deliberation and doing my fair share of research, I finally made the decision to purchase the ADEPTICO Projector. To say that I am thrilled with my choice would be an understatement; this projector is truly a superior blend of quality, functionality, convenience, and affordability.The very first thing that took me by surprise was the show-stopping picture quality. The high-resolution display projects beautifully sharp and detailed images, whether I'm watching a movie, streaming a TV show, or conducting a professional presentation. The color reproduction is genuinely faithful, while the contrast ratio lends a spectacular depth to the visuals. This makes every viewing experience utterly immersive, something that anybody would welcome.What set the ADEPTICO Projector apart for me was its comprehensive range of connectivity options. From HDMI, USB to even wireless streaming, I've found it remarkably easy to connect various devices such as my laptop, gaming console, and certainly my smartphone. Such versatility ensures that the projector satisfies my need for entertainment and work, streaming content smoothly or turning my room into a gaming sanctuary.The projector's ease of setup was another welcoming aspect. Adjusting the focus and screen placement on the wall was a breeze. I was able to stream content from my smartphone within minutes, elevating my viewing experience to a whole new level. Its lightweight nature along with the compact carrying bag adds a dose of portability rarely seen in the projector market; whether it's for an impromptu backyard movie night or playing videos in an unconventional setting, this projector is well-equipped to handle it all.The built-in speakers were another pleasant surprise. Much louder than expected, they deliver solid audio output, although pairing them with dedicated Bluetooth speakers would undoubtedly enhance the experience. Despite being robust, the gentle hum of the fan isn't too distracting, which is a testament to the superior design of the ADEPTICO Projector.Certainly, I did face a small hurdle while trying to connect the projector with my smartphone initially. But after some to-and-fro between resetting settings and the router, it was paired perfectly, delivering seamless performance.So, if you're looking for a versatile projector that combines spectacular image quality, user-friendly operation, multiple connectivity options, and a lightweight design at a reasonable price point, look no further than the ADEPTICO Projector. I am absolutely delighted with my purchase, and look forward to the many movie nights, gaming sessions, and presentations ahead!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "Unbeatable Value and Impressive Performance
reviews.reviewText: I found an affordable yet high-quality projector in the ADEPTICO Projector, and I'm thrilled with my purchase. It provides unbeatable value for money, making it an excellent choice for budget-conscious buyers.Despite its affordable price, the ADEPTICO Projector delivers impressive visual performance. The image quality is sharp and vibrant due to its native resolution and color accuracy. Whether I'm watching movies or playing games, the visuals are engaging and enjoyable. The projector's brightness is commendable, allowing for a decent viewing experience even in moderately lit rooms.The included instructions were clear and concise, guiding me through the process effortlessly. The adjustable focus and keystone correction features made it easy to achieve well-aligned and distortion-free projections. The connectivity options, including HDMI and USB, accommodated all my devices without any issues.The fan noise is minimal, ensuring a distraction-free viewing experience. In terms of portability, the ADEPTICO Projector checks all the right boxes. It's lightweight and compact, making it easy to transport for outdoor movie nights or presentations.In conclusion, the ADEPTICO Projector offers excellent value for money without compromising on performance. Its impressive visuals, easy setup, and solid build quality make it an ideal choice for budget-conscious individuals seeking a reliable and affordable projector. I highly recommend the ADEPTICO Projector for anyone in need of a cost-effective projection solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the price
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a Christmas gift, we tried it out as soon as it started getting dark. We were AMAZED at the image quality. We hooked up my phone with a wireless connection, easy to do, clear instructions.Comes with a case, small enough to easily pack, would be great to use in a hotel or camping.Easily one of the best gifts I've bought in this price range. Couldn't be happer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and Performance
reviews.reviewText: I really love this projector!! I use it all the time to watch movies. It gives a great theater feeling and provides amazing quality. The screen is also large and fits perfectly on my wall. It’s easy to navigate and has simple controls. It also includes information and directions on how to sync/connect it to different devices, which is really useful! The projector also provides great performance and is definitely worth the money! Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth it for the price
reviews.reviewText: The quality itself is pretty good enough. The video is impressive and fairly vivid in darkness. The volume is loud in a positive sense. It is very light and handy. This is a real portable project. There are so many “portable outdoor projectors” on the market, but many are too heavy to take them outdoors. This product is none of them—a truly portable projector. Overall, this projector is worth the price.However, I decided to return it because the video in the center was clear, but the edge of the video was somewhat blurry. Besides, there was a light leaking, and it kept distracting me. On top of that, the sound was buzzing, especially bass. In addition, I could hear its fan noise. It was not too loud, but it kept me from concentrating on movies.Update: After the return, I received a message from the seller that the seller offered a full refund or an exchange. I am satisfied with the customer service even though I didn’t accept the suggestion because I’ve already returned the item and got fully refunded from Amazon. So I change it from 3 stars to 4 stars.
